entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 a.m. ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
